summary: A collection of general‑purpose helper utilities for the Knowledge Repo project, covering environment dependency checks, text encoding conversions, dynamic loading and execution of Python code, Git revision handling, automatic discovery and import of package submodules, automatic registration of subclass implementations, and a lightweight SQLAlchemy type for medium‑sized text fields.
business_intent: Enable the core Knowledge Repo application to reliably manage its runtime dependencies, handle encoding edge cases, execute user‑provided code snippets, interact with Git repositories for versioned content, dynamically load plugin modules, support extensible class hierarchies, and store large text data in a database‑agnostic manner.
